    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Holocaust Coomeration Day -Yom HaShoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holocaust Coomeration Tag - Yom HaShoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Holocauste Jour de Coomeration - Yom HaShoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia De Holocaust Coomeration - Yom HaShoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno Di Holocaust Coomeration - Yom HaShoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημέρα Coomeration ολοκαυτώματος - Yom HaShoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día De Holocaust Coomeration - Yom HaShoa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet with numerous English activities and word games.for pupils related to the Commeration of the Holocaust.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt mit zahlreichen 
englischen Aktivitäten und den Pupillen des Wortes games.for, die auf
dem Commeration des Holocaust in Verbindung gestanden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail avec de nombreuses 
activités anglaises et pupilles du mot games.for liées au 
Commeration du Holocauste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho com atividades 
inglesas numerosas e pupilas da palavra games.for relacionadas ao 
Commeration do Holocaust.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro con le attività 
inglesi numerose e le pupille di parola games.for relative al 
Commeration del Holocaust.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας με τις πολυάριθμες 
αγγλικές δραστηριότητες και μαθητές λέξης games.for σχετικοί 
με το Commeration του ολοκαυτώματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo con actividades 
inglesas numerosas y pupilas de la palabra games.for relacionadas con 
el Commeration del Holocaust.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
